entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as transforming into a balding, middle-aged Muggle man using Polyjuice Potion.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as transforming into Harry's small and rather mousy wife using Polyjuice Potion.

entities.name: polyjuice potion
entities.description: Polyjuice Potion is mentioned as the substance used by Harry and Hermione to transform into Muggles.

entities.name: invisibility cloak
entities.description: The Invisibility Cloak is mentioned as being used by Harry and Hermione to travel under cover of darkness.

entities.name: horcrux
entities.description: The Horcrux is mentioned as an object that Harry is wearing around his neck, apart from the other possessions in the beaded bag.
